short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Air Wolves Pixel Game - Become the one of the legendary Air Wolves and change the outcome of the First World War in the sky.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Become the ace of legendary squadron – Air Wolves! Fly, fight and survive in hardcore battles for the sky during the First World War. This game has been designed in pixel-art style to emphasize a special atmosphere of dogfight and vintage airplanes of the early twentieth century. With a smart combat system your airplane will shoot the enemies automatically, when they are at your aim area. It allows you to focus on driving your aircraft and enjoy the game without being distracted by a bunch of unwanted elements on your screen. 
INTRODUCTION
Play Air Wolves on your Google Chrome Browser with our simple & lightweight extension - No Internet required, no ADS, and 100% Free!

HOW TO INSTALL?
1. Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension
2. Pin the Air Wolves extension icon to the Chrome toolbar
3. Click the Air Wolves icon on the Chrome toolbar, the Air Wolves popup will open. 
That's all you need to do! Have fun!

You also can play more games from the top-left menu


HOW TO PLAY?
To play the game just tap the screen if you use a mobile device or press the “space” button of keyboard to control the flight.
